items.text: Skyscrapers are like giant towers that can hold homes, shops, and offices all in one place!
Most skyscrapers are taller than 100 meters, which is like stacking 30 cars on top of each other!
In crowded cities, skyscrapers help save space by reaching for the sky instead of spreading out.
